page.title: 07GAMES IN BUCKLAND BREWER
page.content:
{DANCING DOLLIES}
THERE ARE AS MANY PEOPLE AS YOU LIKE LINED UP AGAINST A WALL AND THEN SOMEBODY WITH A BALL STANDS IN THE FRONT FACING THE OTHERS. THAT PERSON THEN THROWS THE BALL AT THE PEOPLE WHO DODGE OUT OF THE WAY OF THE BALL BUT IF IT HITS THEM IT IS THEIR GO TO THROW THE BALL.
{JAM TARTS,STRAWBERRY TARTS
YOU NEED THREE PEOPLE AND A SKIPPING ROPE,ONE PERSON HOLDS ONE END OF THE ROPE AND THE OTHER PERSON THE OTHER END.THEY SWING IT AROUND AND THE THIRD PERSON JUMPS OVER THE ROPE AND THEY SAY "JAM TARTS ,STRAWBERRY TARTS WHAT'S THE NAME OF YOUR SWEETHEART?" AND THEY GO THROUGH THE ALPHABET AND IF IT LANDS ON'A' THE TWO PEOPLE HAVE
